data.text: Nicole Brown SimpsonBrown filed for divorce on February 25, 1992 citing'' irreconcilable differences''.Frederick E. CraneIn 1913, in a suit for separation brought by Gardner L. Field against his wife Adelaide, Justice Crane held that a household is managed by the wife, not by the mother of the husband, and that a wife is not obliged to live with the husband if a mother-in-law makes the home unpleasant.Leatrice JoyJoy filed for divorced in August 1924, citing Gilbert's alcoholism.Nathaniel Parker WillisWillis was involved in the 1850 divorce suit between the actor Edwin Forrest and his wife Catherine Norton Sinclair Forrest.Tom GreenBarrymore and Green filed for divorce on December 17, 2001, citing irreconcilable differences.Wallis SimpsonWallis had already filed for divorce from her second husband on the grounds that he had committed adultery with her childhood friend Mary Kirk and the decree nisi was granted on 27 October 1936.David PelletierIn June 2010, SalÃ© and Pelletier announced plans to divorce following an 18-month separation.Hubert DugganDuggan was granted custody of a child born to his wife on 5 August 1929.Lida VoorheesShe was granted a decree of divorce, with custody of her children in New York Co. on December 1, 1910.David RozgonyiAs the friendship deepened over the next year, his wife eventually asked for a divorce in July 2006.Mae WestAccording to Deiro's biographer, West filed for divorce on the grounds of adultery on July 14, 1920.Billy Ray CyrusOn October 26, 2010, Cyrus filed for divorce from his wife in Tennessee, citing irreconcilable differences.Alexandre PatoHowever, the marriage lasted less than ten months, and the couple divorced on 21 April 2010, with Brito citing Pato's constant partying as the reason for their split.Jos? LindHe walked out on the Royals in the middle of 1995 after his wife filed for divorce, and they placed him on waivers shortly thereafter.Theresa KnorrShe filed for divorce from Harris in November 1976 after she reportedly found out that Harris enjoyed taking nude photographs of women.Sybil EversAccording to his biographer Mark Ryan, Abrahams had a fear of commitment and old-fashioned ideas about the role of women in marriage, but he was able to overcome these, and the couple wed in December 1936.Sandy BowersThough she was married at the time to someone else, Eilley married Bowers on August 9, 1859, and ten months later, she divorced Alexander Cowan on grounds of desertion.Johnny VegasVegas and Donnelly were divorced by agreement on 11 March 2008 after having lived apart for more than two years.Britney SpearsIn November 2006, Spears filed for divorce from Federline, citing irreconcilable differences.Clint EastwoodOn October 23, 2013, Eastwood's wife filed for divorce after she withdrew her request of a separation citing irreconcilable differences.Joseph RalstonRalston claimed this was while he and his wife Linda were separated, however she disputed that assertion, claiming the affair continued and led to their 1988 divorce.Larry FortenskyThe couple split after five years in 1996 with Fortensky hiring New York divorce attorney Raoul Felder.Marie DresslerDalton's first wife Lizzie claimed that he had not consented to a divorce or been served divorce papers, while Dalton claimed to have divorced her in 1905.Clementine Churchill, Baroness Spencer-ChurchillAfter Sir Henry found Lady Blanche with a lover in 1891, she managed to avert her husband's suit for divorce due to his own infidelities, and thereafter the couple separated.Terry SouthernTerry and Carol Southern divorced in early 1972 but remained on good terms and Southern continued to support and help raise their son Nile.Malcolm SargentSargent's marriage was unhappy and ended in divorce in 1946.Regis Henri PostShe filed for divorce in 1922.K.d. langThey separated on September 6, 2011, and Lang filed for a dissolution of the partnership in Los Angeles Superior Court on December 30.Mort CooperHe was married to Bernadine, who filed for divorce in 1945.George, Count JoannesMary Eliza divorced him in May 1869 in Boston for'' desertion and lack of support''.George Tuttle BrokawAccording to Boothe, Brokaw was an abusive alcoholic, and the marriage ended in divorce in 1929.SelvaraghavanAfter their two-year marriage Sonia Agarwal and Selvaraghavan filed for divorce with mutual consent in a Chennai family court on 9 August 2009.KelisIn April 2009 she filed for divorce, citing'' irreconcilable differences''.?ric BessonIn 2013, the couple Besson ended in divorce proceedings.Heidi NewfieldOn Sept. 14, 2011, she announced that she had filed for divorce.Sara Northrup HollisterIn June 1986, following Hubbard's death, the Church of Scientology and Alexis agreed a financial settlement under which she was compelled not to write or speak on the subject of L. Ron Hubbard and her relationship to him.Jim BussThey divorced in late 1985 with Buss gaining sole custody of their son.Smokey RobinsonAfter Robinson admitted this, he filed for legal separation and, later, divorce, which was granted in 1986.James BrownIn an attempt to prove her marriage to Brown was valid, Hynie produced a 2001 marriage certificate as proof of her marriage to Brown, but she did not provide King with court records pointing to an annulment of her marriage to him or to Ahmed.Kristen McMenamyAfter 16 years of marriage, McMenamy filed for divorce in April 2013.Jill EsmondPressed by Olivier, who was anxious to marry Leigh, she eventually agreed and they were divorced on 29 January 1940.Sid BassOn October 6, 2011, it was reported that Mercedes and Sid Bass, anchors of the city's business and philanthropic world, announced their divorce, ending 23 years of marriage.Sheila BellushBlackthorne who had stalked Bellush since their divorce in 1987, allegedly wanted custody of their two children.Marty PeretzThe couple divorced in 2009, his wife citing infidelity and bad temper as problems in the marriage.Tallulah BankheadBankhead filed for divorce in Reno, Nevada, in May 1941.John HickenlooperOn July 31, 2012, Gov. Hickenlooper announced that he and his wife were separating after 10 years of marriage.Warren ChisumIn 2008, Chisum announced support for his proposal to prolong the waiting time in Texas to finalize a divorce.Annie ChapmanFollowing this, both Chapman and her husband took to heavy drinking and separated in 1884.Martha Raye Raye's marriage to Harris in a Las Vegas ceremony made headlines in 1991, partly because Raye was 75 and Harris was 42 and partly because the two had known each other for less than a month.Ulla AnderssonAlthough she and Quincy Jones were formally separated, they were not legally divorced until 1974.Corey DillonIn April 2010, his wife filed for divorce.Richard Mellon ScaifeOn April 11, 2006 Scaife confided to a gossip columnist that he and Margaret'' Ritchie'' Battle Scaife plan to divorce and that their marriage began without a prenuptial agreement.Billy Ray CyrusOn June 13, 2013, Tish filed for divorce from Billy Ray after 19 years of marriage, citing irreconcilable differences.Maria ShriverOn May 9, 2011, Schwarzenegger and Shriver announced their separation after 25 years of marriage, with Shriver moving out of the couple's Brentwood mansion.M?nie Muriel Dowie In 1903 Henry Norman divorced her, causing a scandal by publicly accusing her of adultery with mountaineer Edward Fitzgerald.Ralph CarpenterHis 1932 marriage to Cynthia Ramsey ended in divorce.Boris BeckerAfter Becker asked Barbara for a separation in December 2000, she flew to Miami, Florida with Noah and Elias, and filed a divorce petition in Miami-Dade County Court, sidestepping their prenuptial agreement, which had entitled her to a single $ 2.Rudy GiulianiGiuliani and Hanover finally settled their acrimonious divorce case in July 2002, after his mayoralty had ended, with Giuliani paying Hanover a $ 6.Jon CorzineCorzine and the still married Katz were soon dating, and they began appearing in public as a couple in early 2002, shortly after Corzine's unofficial separation from his wife Joanne.Gilbert CannanHer husband sought to be reconciled, but relented and divorced her in a high-profile case, and she and Cannan were married in 1910.Elena Mumm Thornton WilsonThey fell deeply in love, went to Reno, Nevada, divorced their respective spouses, and remarried there in December, 1946, when he was 51 and she was 40.Cheryl HinesOn July 20, 2010, Hines and Young filed papers for their divorce after nearly eight years of marriage.Swastika MukherjeeAccording to Mukherjee, Sen filed for divorce in 2000, but changed his mind later when she became successful in her acting career.Martha O'DriscollFollowing her last film, Carnegie Hall (1947), and a final divorce decree (on July 18, 1947) from her first marriage, she married, two days later, her second husband, Chicago businessman, Arthur I. Appleton.John A. HullShe would divorce him on May 22, 1934, in Reno, Nevada.Richard DutcherAfter 23 years of marriage, they divorced in 2011 with Dutcher citing his decision to leave the church a'' contributing factor'' to the divorce.Ian Campbell, 11th Duke of ArgyllHe was the 11th Duke of Argyll, but is chiefly remembered for his unhappy marriage to and scandalous 1963 divorce from Margaret Whigham.Murray HumphreysIn 1957, after a separation of three years from her husband, Mary Brendle Humphreys filed for divorce.Mary Lawson (actress)It is uncertain when the affair between Lawson and Beaumont began, but Beaumont's wife purchased an announcement in the 30 November 1937 edition of The Times asking for a'' dissolution'' of their marriage'' on the ground of his adultery with Miss Mary Lawson.''Martin LawrenceLawrence filed for divorce from Gibbs on April 25, 2012, citing irreconcilable differences and asking for joint legal and physical custody of the children.Travis Barker Barker's first marriage, to Melissa Kennedy, lasted nine months until he filed for divorce in August 2002.Clara BerangerIn June 1926, William to the surprise of his wife, announced that he wanted a divorce.Lelia J. RobinsonAfter Robinson divorced her husband in 1877 for adultery, the only acceptable grounds for divorce at that time, she decided to pursue a legal career in effort to support herself at the age of twenty-eight.Grace La RueShe married Hamilton on May 29, 1920, amid a whirl of controversy surrounding a lawsuit filed by Hamilton's first wife.Dorothy ParkerShe eventually separated from her husband, divorcing in 1928, and had a number of affairs.Lamar OdomOn December 13, 2013 after months of speculated separation, Kardashian filed for divorce from Odom, and for legal restoration of her last name.William BeebeIn January 1913, Blair left Beebe for Reno with the intention of divorcing him, since at this time in history it was easier to obtain a divorce in Reno than in most other areas of the United States.Bernard EbbersHis second wife filed for divorce from him on April 16, 2008, less than two years after he entered prison.William Bennett KilpackKilpack sent his wife to Paris but, according to The New York Times, failed to follow her there as he promised, so she divorced him there in March 1925 on grounds of desertion.Rhona MartinPrior to the 2006 Winter Olympics, it was reported that Martin was living on welfare and that her financial problems were causing her to live apart from her husband.Norman W. WalkerIt is not known when and where Norman and Margaret divorced, but the 18 Jan. 1943 issue of the Reno (NV) Evening Gazette reported a Marriage Application for Norman W. Walker of San Francisco and Helen Ruth Kerby of Carson City.Steve HofmeyrThe couple was divorced after reports of numerous affairs dominated Hofmeyr's time in the spotlight in 2008.Nelson MandelaInitiating divorce proceedings in May 1956, she claimed that Mandela had physically abused her ; he denied the allegations, and fought for custody of their children.Aamir KhanIn December 2002, Khan filed for divorce, ending the 15-year marriage.Kathlyn WilliamsThey supposedly divorced over Kainer's disapproval of his wife having an acting career, and Williams subsequently obtained a divorce from Kainer in 1909 in Nevada.Dorian LeighOn April 23, 1957, Leigh's 40th birthday, de Portago told Leigh that he was supposedly finally divorcing Carroll so they could be legally married.Cindy BirdsongBirdsong filed for divorce in March, 1975 citing'' irreconcilable differences''.John Douglas, 9th Marquess of QueensberryThey had four sons and a daughter ; his wife successfully sued for divorce in 1887 on the grounds of his adultery.Elena FordIn 1997, Elena Ford was involved in a dispute with her half-siblings by her father's third wife, Eugenia Livanos.Bobby BrownFollowing fourteen years of marriage, Brown and Houston filed for legal separation in September 2006.Aretha FranklinFranklin's parents had a troubled marriage due to stories of C. L. Franklin's philandering and in 1948, they separated, with Barbara relocating back to Buffalo with her son, Vaughn, from a previous affair.Ryuichi SakamotoHis first marriage took place in 1972 but ended in divorce two years later.Kathleen Clarice GroomWhen Herman Klein became aware of it he filed a petition for divorce, which was granted in December 1901.Isabella GlynThey were divorced on her petition on 10 May 1874.Thomas JaneIn January 2009, Arquette filed for divorce from Jane on the grounds of irreconcilable differences, but the couple soon reconciled and Arquette requested to abandon the divorce petition on July 9, 2009.
